TextBlock.Text: PYE: Station Log 75! The launch was a success! I'm writing this from orbit! Naturally, I'm thrilled, whereas Idaea hasn't even boarded to see what it looks like.
PYE: I'll take this chance to pretty the place up a little. It'll be easier without him moping around and getting in the way.
IDAEA: I have arrived now. And I object to making this place "pretty". This is our most wretched construction, and the design is hostile to match.
PYE: You are aware that you can't stop me from making changes forever? I need a reading nook!
IDAEA: I suppose you're not incorrect. I'd sooner extract blood from a mineral than make you see reason. Fine, you may take the upper level.
PYE: Oh, I may take the upper level? This is our station, it isn't yours to divy out.
IDAEA: So you do not want the upper level?
IDAEA: I have a son, Pye. I can't dedicate every waking hour of my life to this nightmare.
